ISSUE.TITLE: Scroll page up when using paging on catalog pages
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40.4 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Enable "Use AJAX products loading" (admin area > configuration > settings > catalog settings) 2. Open some catalog page with paging (e.g. https://demo.nopcommerce.com/awesome) 3. Click page 2 at the bottom It should smoothly scroll up to the top of the products block. A customer should not do it manually
